attributes.action: Austerity from top down not bottom up
attributes.additional_details: The people at the bottom of the social ladder should be the last people to have austerity measures placed upon them.Banks caused this crisis not everyday people so austerity should start at top.The government should also have to chip in from their pages.ie no 32% pay rise;in fact they should be forced to take fifty percent pay cut for failing the people.also they should have their expense accounts stopped.pay your own expenses.The government has failed.get rid of permeneantly.guy fawkes had right idea!

rejection.details: MP's pay and expenses are a matter for Parliament, not the Government.
